4000.name: The Hills
4000.description:
The area is a path leading north, small hills surround you. You feel the
forces of evil approach you from the north. Off in the distance to the
northeast Visible is the beginning of a large mountain range. Rocks jut
from the grassy slopes. The view stretches for miles in every direction.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Hills

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Plains

4001.name: The Hills
4001.description:
The area is a small path leading north, dark threatening hills surround
you on almost all sides. A fair distance off to the north, Visible is
the enormous shadow of a strangely solitaire mountain. Rocks jut from
the grassy slopes. The wind carries the scent of wild herbs.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward The End Of The Path

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Hills

4002.name: The End Of The Path
4002.description:
The path stops here, to the north is a single mountain and around
are some threatening hills. A small trail leads up the hillside through
the rocks to a dark cave located to the north. Off to the northeast, you
can see the southern end of what appears to be a large mountain range.
Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. Sheep trails wind between the
hillocks.

north.description: An open path leads to The Cave

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Hills

4010.name: The Cave
4010.description:
This is a small cave, about fifteen feet across at the widest point and
about forty feet long. Off to the south you sense fresh air and you
surmise that the entrance must be located off in that direction. To the
north a small tunnel continues into the mountain. The air is fresh and
clean. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward The End Of The Path

4011.name: The Tunnel
4011.description:
You force your way into a narrow tunnel, aided by the wet walls which
help you slide through the passageway. The smell of mouldy moss is
growing greater the farther north you head, but you can smell fresh air
off to the south as a light breeze wafts past you. Ancient trees rise on
all sides. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

south.description: An open path leads to The Cave

4012.name: The Tunnel
4012.description:
The passage opens at a turn in this narrow tunnel. The tunnel appears to
open up to the north into a cave of some sort while to the east it leads
onwards through the mountain. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.
The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4013.name: The Tunnel
4013.description:
Standing in the middle of the dusty floor of this tunnel, Visible is
that it is not a highly travelled passageway. It looks to lead in an
east-west direction. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.
The scent of pine and earth fills the air.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4014.name: The Tunnel
4014.description:
The passage opens at a small intersection of sorts in this tunnel. The
main tunnel appears to curve from south to west but there is an entrance
into a cave to the north. The entrance itself looks to be unnatural and
much more recent than the tunnel or even the cave. Bird calls echo
through the canopy. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: An open path leads to The Cave

south.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4015.name: The Tunnel
4015.description:
You clamber on through this narrow tunnel. The walls are damp with
condensation and the weight of the rock above is beginning to make
you feel almost claustrophobic. The tunnel makes a jagged turn from west
to north here. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4016.name: The Large Cave
4016.description:
The passage opens in a fairly large cave. Large enough that the eastern
and western ends are almots completely shrouded in darkness. A small
tunnel breaks through the southern wall, and it too is full of shadows.
The open sky stretches overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

south.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

down.description: A narrow shaft descends into a maze of sticks and shadow.

4017.name: The Large Cave
4017.description:
You move along the cave to the west end of it and find that there
appears to be no other exit from here. The walls are fairly smooth and
look to have been naturally carved out of the rock by the passage of
water. Wildflowers dot the landscape. The ground is soft underfoot.

west.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

4018.name: The Cave
4018.description:
The passage opens at the southern end of a cave as it begins to turn
into a tunnel which leads off to the south. The cave continues
northwards deeper into the darkness. You notice a large pile of bones in
the corner. The ground is soft underfoot. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: An open path leads to The Cave

south.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4019.name: The Tunnel
4019.description:
The area opens in the middle of a fairly wide passageway that leads in a
north-south direction. The walls are quite smooth, almost as if a river
had gouged them out of the earth. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The
scent of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Many Tunnels

south.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4020.name: The Hole
4020.description:
This is a small alcove off the main tunnel. There is a fairly wide hole
broken through the floor of the alcove. The only other exit is to the
north. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

down.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4021.name: The Hole
4021.description:
As you stand at the end of this tunnel, you notice a large hole sitting
in the floor by the northwestern corner of the walls. The tunnel itself
leads off towards the east. The air here feels very damp and you feel
like your clothes are becoming sticky with sweat. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Damp Tunnel

down.description: A trail winds toward The Dark Passage

4022.name: The Damp Tunnel
4022.description:
This is the middle of a damp tunnel. The moisture in the air is so thick
that you can almost seem it seeping into your clothes. The tunnel
continues to the north and west. A large cave opens up to the east. Bird
calls echo through the canopy. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Damp Tunnel

east.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

west.description: A trail winds toward The Hole

4023.name: The Large Cave
4023.description:
This is the western part of the large cave, to the east Visible is a
tunnel. The air near the tunnel entrance is heavy with moisture, giving
you a feeling as if you were standing in the rain. The walls of the cave
are almost totally shrouded in darkness and shadow as is the southern
end of the cavern. The air is fresh and clean. Tall grass sways in a
gentle breeze.

east.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

west.description: A trail winds toward The Damp Tunnel

4024.name: The Damp Tunnel
4024.description:
The tunnel you are in now is very humid, and the air seems to almost
hang with moisture. The walls drip with an almost constant water flow,
and the ground is covered with small pools of stagnent water. The tunnel
leads away to the south, and to the west you can feel that the air is
even damper than here. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

south.description: A trail winds toward The Damp Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4025.name: The Cave
4025.description:
The passage opens standing in the northern end of a reasonably large
cave. The cave wall to the east has an opening that appears to lead to a
junction of several tunnels. The air is fresh and clean. Wildflowers dot
the landscape.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Many Tunnels

south.description: An open path leads to The Cave

4026.name: The Many Tunnels
4026.description:
The passage opens standing in the midst of an intersection of numerous
tunnels. There is a musty smell emanating from the tunnel to the north,
whilst the one to the west appears to open up almost immediately into a
cave. The tunnels to the south and east are totally shrouded in
darkness. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Ancient trees
rise on all sides.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Smelly Tunnel

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

south.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: An open path leads to The Cave

4027.name: The Tunnel
4027.description:
The passage opens at an elbow turn in the tunnel as it turns to the west
and north. You spot a small alcove hidden in the shadows just to the to
the south, and you can feel a breeze coming from somewhere to the north
you believe. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls
echo through the canopy.

north.description: An open path leads to The Cave

south.description: A trail winds toward The Hole

west.description: A trail winds toward The Many Tunnels

4028.name: The Smelly Tunnel
4028.description:
This is a fairly small north-south leading tunnel. There is a a small
light visible off to the north. As you stop for a moment, you notice a
strange smell from the north. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.
Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

south.description: A trail winds toward The Many Tunnels

4029.name: The Cave
4029.description:
This is a cave that is filled with fresh air, you sense the wind blowing
from the north. To the south you see a small tunnel continue into the
mountain. The open sky stretches overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

north.description: An open path leads to The Valley

south.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4030.name: The Light Cave
4030.description:
This is a light cave, through a hole large above, you see the sky. A
small tunnel to the south is the only way out. You notice the source of
the strange smell, all around there are corpses of several monsters.
Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The ground is soft underfoot.

south.description: A trail winds toward The Smelly Tunnel

4031.name: The Valley
4031.description:
This is a small valley, surrounded by hills and a mountain to the south.
In the mountain there is a cave. To the north you can enter the hills.
There is a small trail leading up a steep hill to the east. Tall grass
sways in a gentle breeze. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Foothills

east.description: You spot a small trail leading into the hills to the east.

south.description: An open path leads to The Cave

4032.name: The Foothills
4032.description:
The area is a winding path that leads through the foothills on the north
side of Mount Moria. The path continues north. The terrain rolls and
dips around. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks.

north.description: The Intersection In The Foothills

south.description: An open path leads to The Valley

4033.name: The Intersection In The Foothills
4033.description:
The area opens at a point by a small path that splits off here. The path
continues north and south while a rough trail leads east into the
mountains. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks. The terrain rolls and
dips around.

north.description: An open path leads to The Grassy Area In The Foothills

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Path Through The Foothills

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Foothills

4034.name: The Grassy Area In The Foothills
4034.description:
The grass here is unusually high. You notice several areas where someone
or something large has crushed spots of it down. Several very large
rocks litter this area. You can go north towards the end of the
foothills, west to go deeper into the foothills, or south to a small
path intersection. The ground is soft underfoot. Wildflowers dot the
landscape.

north.description: A rocky path climbs toward At The Foothills' End

south.description: The Intersection In The Foothills

west.description: An open path leads to The Level Foothills

4035.name: At The Foothills' End
4035.description:
The passage opens standing at the northern edge of the foothills where
they meet the plains which lie to the north. You can head back into the
foothills to the south or the plains to the north. Sheep trails wind
between the hillocks. The terrain rolls and dips around.

north.description: An open path leads to The Plains

south.description: An open path leads to The Grassy Area In The Foothills

4036.name: The Plains
4036.description:
This is the plains. The path leads to the south. As you look around you
notice a small almost invisible trail leading away to the west towards a
copse of trees. The ground is soft underfoot. Tall grass sways in a
gentle breeze.

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward At The Foothills' End

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Copse Of Trees

4037.name: The Path Through The Foothills
4037.description:
The area opens on a path that leads through the foothills in an east-
west direction. Some distance off to the west Visible is a small
intersection of paths and off to the east you see that the path seems to
come to an end as part of the mountain chain juts out of the ground,
blocking your view of the sky. The terrain rolls and dips around. The
view stretches for miles in every direction.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to The Base Of The Mountain

west.description: The Intersection In The Foothills

4038.name: The Base Of The Mountain
4038.description:
The passage opens standing at the bottom of a large mountain in the
mountain chain which begins at Mount Moria and stretches north towards
the top of the world. A small path leads off through the foothills
towards the west, where Visible is plains quite a ways away. To the east
you spot a small worn trail leading up the side of the mountain. Snow
clings to shadowed crevices. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Trail Up The Mountain

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Path Through The Foothills

4039.name: A Trail Up The Mountain
4039.description:
The area opens partway up the mountainside on a narrow yet well worn
trail. The trail curves its way up the side of the mountain towards the
top and westwards down the mountain into the foothills below. The wind
howls around exposed peaks. The path is steep and treacherous.

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The Base Of The Mountain

up.description: A steep trail ascends to The Mountain Top

4040.name: The Mountain Top
4040.description:
The passage opens at what is essentially the summit of this mountain. It
certainly seemed taller from the ground didn't it? The plateau you stand
on is close to thirty metres across and a small gouge in the north side
of it looks to lead to a small cavern. A small trail leads down towards
a valley that was hidden away on the east side of the mountain. The wind
howls around exposed peaks. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

north.description: An open path leads to The Lion's Den

east.description: A steep trail ascends to On A Mountain Trail

down.description: A steep trail ascends to A Trail Up The Mountain

4041.name: The Lion's Den
4041.description:
Following the gouge down to the cave entrance, you clamber through the
small entranceway only to find yourself in what appears to be the living
den of a large carnivorous animal! The air is fresh and clean. The
ground is soft underfoot.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to The Mountain Top

4042.name: The Level Foothills
4042.description:
You continue to move through the foothills and notice that off in the
distance to the west, Visible is a rather large cave entrance in the
side of a large hill. The hill seems to jut up from the rest of the
foothills quite unnaturally. A path leads off towards the east as it
seems to begin from nothing here. The ground is soft underfoot.
Wildflowers dot the landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to The Grassy Area In The Foothills

west.description: An open path leads to The Cave Entrance

4043.name: The Cave Entrance
4043.description:
The area opens in a large tunnel, much larger than it seemed from the
outside. The ceiling is at least twenty feet above, and the width of the
tunnel runs at least fifteen feet. You can feel the fresh air coming
from the east, and off to the west, it looks to lead into darkness. The
open sky stretches overhead. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to The Level Foothills

west.description: An open path leads to The Hill Giant Cave

4044.name: The Hill Giant Cave
4044.description:
The passage opens inside a rather large cavern. The ceiling stands at
least twenty five feet above, if not more. The walls are so far away,
that the shadows of the room obscure them almost completely. Out of all
of the grandeur in this cave however, nothing seems to catch your eye
quite as much as the enormous table standing in the middle of the sandy
floor. It stands tall enough for you to walk under it without the need
to hunch over. A large tunnel leads out of the eastern wall of the
cavern. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The open sky stretches
overhead.

east.description: An open path leads to The Cave Entrance

4045.name: The Steep Trail
4045.description:
This trail leads up a steep hill to a point where it levels out as it
begins to pass between the mountains that surround you. It continues
through the hills to the east and heads down to the valley to the west.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

east.description: The rocky trail continues.

west.description: The valley lies at the bottom of the steep trail.

4046.name: Between The Mountains
4046.description:
The trail between the mountains seems almost endless as you continue to
trek along it. It continues to both the east and west. Snow clings to
shadowed crevices. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards.

west.description: The trail continues westwards.

4047.name: The Foothills
4047.description:
After a long trek, you find yourself in the foothills again. You spot a
narrow trail leading away to the northwest not too far distant to the
west. The wind howls around exposed peaks. Snow clings to shadowed
crevices.

east.description: You can head towards the narrow trail this way.

west.description: The trail leading back through the mountains seems to go on forever.

4048.name: The Foothills
4048.description:
A short trek through the foothills and you find yourself facing a trail
that leads between the mountains to the west. The trail through them
looks to be very long and probably quite tiring. You spot a narrow trail
leading away to the northwest not too far distant to the west. The air
is thin and cold at this altitude. The path is steep and treacherous.

east.description: You can head towards the narrow trail this way.

west.description: The trail leading through the mountains seems to go on forever.

4049.name: The Foothills
4049.description:
This is a point on the trail where it turns slowly from an almost
straight westwards trail into a trail meandering towards the northwest.
Sheep trails wind between the hillocks. The terrain rolls and dips
around.

north.description: A small trail leads away to the northwest.

west.description: A trail heads towards the mountains to the west.

4050.name: The Tunnel
4050.description:
This is a bend in the tunnel here. It turns from an eastwards heading to
a southwards one. The walls are cold and seem to be damp with moisture.
Visible is some greenish moss growing up near the roof of the passageway
on the northern wall. A collapsed section to the north looks recently
cleared. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

south.description: You see an exit south.

north.description: A narrow opening in the rock.
north.reveal_message: You pry loose rubble, exposing a side shaft to the north.

4051.name: The Tunnel
4051.description:
Standing in this part of the tunnel, you notice that not only does the
tunnel get suddenly narrower, but the floor does not seem to be nearly
as smooth as it was before. In fact, the floor drops almost five feet in
jagged steps as you look eastward. The western path seems to be quite
smooth however. Ancient trees rise on all sides. Bird calls echo through
the canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4052.name: The Tunnel
4052.description:
Continuing along the tunnel, you find that the floor has begun to smooth
itself out once more. Looking about, you notice a small spring of water
bubbling up near the southern wall. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4053.name: The Tunnel
4053.description:
You continue along the tunnel to find yourself at a right angle turn.
The passage leads north and east from here. The way to the north seems
to be a longer tunnel which continues on through the gloom of the
underearth. The way to the east is a fresh change from what would
normally be found this far underground in that the tunnel seems to open
up into a fairly large and well lit cave. Ancient trees rise on all
sides. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

east.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

4054.name: The Light Cave
4054.description:
The cave you stand in now is lit by an eerie flickering light, which
probably comes from the enormous fire which is burning a short distance
to the south in what looks to be the middle of the cave. The flickering
light creates some really strange and almost frightening shadows on the
walls, almost hiding the two tunnels that lead away from here, one to
the east and one to the west. Wildflowers dot the landscape. The open
sky stretches overhead.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

south.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4055.name: The Maze
4055.description:
The area opens in yet another small and damp tunnel. The ceiling hangs
quite low overhead and the passage twists off into darkness. The only
exit from here looks to be off to the west. The forest floor is carpeted
with fallen leaves. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

west.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

4056.name: The Light Cave
4056.description:
The cave you stand in now is lit by an eerie flickering light, which
comes from the enormous fire which is burning right ahead in the middle
of this large cave. The fire gives off more than enough light to see
both the north and south ends of the cave. Wildflowers dot the
landscape. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze.

north.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

south.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

4057.name: The Maze
4057.description:
The area opens in yet another small and damp tunnel. The ceiling hangs
quite low overhead and the passage twists off into darkness. The only
exits from here look to be off to the north and south. The scent of pine
and earth fills the air. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

south.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

4058.name: The Maze
4058.description:
The area opens in yet another small and damp tunnel. The ceiling hangs
quite low overhead and the passage twists off into darkness. The only
exits from here look to be off to the south and west. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Ancient trees rise on all
sides.

south.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

west.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

4059.name: The Tunnel
4059.description:
This is a tunnel deep inside the heart of Mount Moria. A small rivulet
of water runs alongside the wall to the north as the tunnel seems to
lead slightly down towards the east. The tunnel continues on to the east
as it plunges deeper into the earth, and upwards a bit towards the west
where the air seems to be quite damp. The forest floor is carpeted with
fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Damp Tunnel

4060.name: The Tunnel
4060.description:
The area opens in a section of this small tunnel which seems to be
almost level. There is a small pool of water collecting beside the north
wall indicating perhaps a low spot on the floor. The pool is being fed
by a small rivulet which is coursing along the northern wall from the
west, but yet the water level in the pool does not seem to be changing.
Looking either way down the tunnel, Visible is that the tunnel climbs to
the west, and to the east, a strange flickering light shows that the
tunnel opens up into a cave of sorts. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4061.name: The Light Cave
4061.description:
The cave you stand in now is lit by an eerie flickering light, which
probably comes from the enormous fire which is burning a short distance
to the north in what looks to be the middle of the cave. The flickering
light creates some really strange and almost frightening shadows on the
walls, almost hiding the two tunnels that lead away from here, one to
the west and one to the south. The open sky stretches overhead. The
ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

south.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4062.name: The Maze
4062.description:
The area opens in yet another small and damp tunnel. The ceiling hangs
quite low overhead and the passage twists off into darkness. The only
exits from here look to be off to the east and west. Ancient trees rise
on all sides. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

west.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

4063.name: The Maze
4063.description:
The area opens in yet another small and damp tunnel. The ceiling hangs
quite low overhead and the passage twists off into darkness. The only
exits from here look to be off to the east and north. The scent of pine
and earth fills the air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4064.name: The Tunnel
4064.description:
The area opens in a small chamber beneath the earth. The chamber closes
down to tunnel size to the west as the only obvious exit leads away in
that direction. Before heading off that way, you decide to look around
the cave. The walls are slightly damp to the touch, and the ceiling is
very smooth. Almost right in the centre of the ceiling, a well rounded
hole has been made. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Ancient
trees rise on all sides.

west.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

up.description: A trail winds toward The Hole

4065.name: The Maze
4065.description:
The area opens in yet another small and damp tunnel. The ceiling hangs
quite low overhead and the passage twists off into darkness. The only
exits from here look to be off to the east and north. To the north, you
can see the entrance to what looks to be a large and well lit cave. Bird
calls echo through the canopy. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air.

north.description: An open path leads to The Light Cave

east.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

4066.name: The Maze
4066.description:
The area opens in yet another small and damp tunnel. The ceiling hangs
quite low overhead and the passage twists off into darkness. The only
exits from here look to be off to the east, south, and north. To the
south, the tunnel looks to open up into a cavern. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

east.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

south.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

4067.name: The Maze
4067.description:
The area opens in yet another small and damp tunnel. The ceiling hangs
quite low overhead and the passage twists off into darkness. The only
exits from here look to be off to the west and north. Ancient trees rise
on all sides. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

west.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

4068.name: The Large Cave
4068.description:
The passage opens in what is perhaps the largest cave you have ever been
in. It stretches through the darkness to the east and south. The cave is
nigh filled with echoes created by the sound of your breathing.
Stalactites and stalagmites hang down from the ceiling and climb upwards
from the ground of the cavern respectively. The open sky stretches
overhead. The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

south.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

4069.name: The Large Cave
4069.description:
The passage opens in what is perhaps the largest cave you have ever been
in. It stretches through the darkness to the west and south. The cave is
nigh filled with echoes created by the sound of your breathing.
Stalactites and stalagmites hang down from the ceiling and climb upwards
from the ground of the cavern respectively. A narrow tunnel leads away
from the cave to the north. The air is fresh and clean. The open sky
stretches overhead.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Maze

south.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

west.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

4070.name: The Large Cave
4070.description:
The passage opens in what is perhaps the largest cave you have ever been
in. It stretches through the darkness to the east and north. The cave is
nigh filled with echoes created by the sound of your breathing.
Stalactites and stalagmites hang down from the ceiling and climb upwards
from the ground of the cavern respectively. A faint draft carries a
metallic tang from the east. The open sky stretches overhead. The ground
is soft underfoot.

north.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

east.description: A narrow crack between stones.
east.reveal_message: Magic reveals a hidden crack leading east.

4071.name: The Large Cave
4071.description:
The passage opens in what is perhaps the largest cave you have ever been
in. It stretches through the darkness to the west and south. The cave is
nigh filled with echoes created by the sound of your breathing.
Stalactites and stalagmites hang down from the ceiling and climb upwards
from the ground of the cavern respectively. A narrow tunnel leads away
from the cave to the east. The open sky stretches overhead. The air is
fresh and clean.

north.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

4072.name: The Tunnel
4072.description:
The area opens in a narrow tunnel. It makes a turn from east to south
here as it heads through the rock of the mountain. The western wall of
the tunnel looks to have broken through a small, natural crack in the
rock to lead into what appears to be a fairly large cave. The scent of
pine and earth fills the air. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

east.description: A trail winds toward The End Of The Tunnel

south.description: A trail winds toward The Hole

west.description: An open path leads to The Large Cave

4073.name: The End Of The Tunnel
4073.description:
The tunnel comes to a sudden halt here. How very bizarre. The only exit
is back to the west, where the tunnel leads back through the mountain.
There is absolutely nothing of any interest down at the end of this
passageway either. How odd. Bird calls echo through the canopy. The
scent of pine and earth fills the air.

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4074.name: The Hole
4074.description:
This is a small hole in the floor. Alas, you can only leave north
because to leave down into the unknown, you must be able to fit through
the hole, which is far too small for you! Ancient trees rise on all
sides. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4075.name: The Copse Of Trees
4075.description:
Standing in this copse of trees gives you an eerie feeling. Off to the
east Visible is the plains, and just to the north a strange shadow seems
to be changing shape constantly and almost seems to beckon you to enter
it. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks. The terrain rolls and dips
around.

north.description: There is a strange shadow forming before you.

east.description: An open path leads to The Plains

4076.name: On A Mountain Trail
4076.description:
The passage opens on a mountain trail twisting down towards a small
hidden valley located in the shadow of another mountain a short distance
to the east. The trail is fairly rough going and looks to dip down into
the small valley before climbing up the side of the other mountain. As
you look at the valley from a closer vantage point, you realize that it
is much smaller than you had expected, being maybe thirty feet long. It
is quite surprising how deceptive distances can be this high up in the
mountains, isn't it? The wind howls around exposed peaks. Snow clings to
shadowed crevices.

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The Mountain Top

down.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Hidden Valley

4077.name: In The Hidden Valley
4077.description:
This valley seems to be a complete waste of a climb down the
mountainside. Of course, there is always the carefully hidden trail that
you just noticed on the eastern side of the valley, leading up the
eastern mountain that is blocking most of the sky from you. Snow clings
to shadowed crevices. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Mountain Trail

up.description: A steep trail ascends to On A Mountain Trail

4078.name: In The Hidden Valley
4078.description:
This small valley is hidden away in the shadow of the large mountain to
the east. The trail leading up it to the east seems to vanish before
your eyes, but you are quickly able to find it once again. A trail leads
up the mountain to the west as well. Bare rock dominates the landscape.
The wind howls around exposed peaks.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Mountain Trail

up.description: A steep trail ascends to On A Mountain Trail

4100.name: The Tunnel
4100.description:
As you continue along this tunnel which heads deeper and deeper into the
earth, you notice that the tunnel must be a lot steeper than you
previously expected as there is a small rivulet of water gushing down
the one side of the tunnel. The tunnel appears to extend straight to the
east for quite some distance. Pick marks on the west wall suggest a
hidden seam. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light. Bird
calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Long Tunnel

west.description: A braced tunnel behind a false wall.
west.reveal_message: You find a braced door hidden behind a false wall.

4101.name: The Long Tunnel
4101.description:
The tunnel seems to be slightly sloped here as it continues in its east-
west direction. The tunnel walls are far apart, almost allowing for four
people to travel abreast with ease. The walls do not seem to be very
damp, but there is a small rivulet running along the northern wall of
the tunnel. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Branches
intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Long Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4102.name: The Long Tunnel
4102.description:
As you travel along this long tunnel, you begin to wonder just how long
it is. The walls are fairly far apart, but Visible is that they begin to
close in rather rapidly to the east. In fact, the manner in which they
come together almost reminds you of a funnel. Branches intertwine
overhead, filtering the light. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen
leaves.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Long Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Long Tunnel

4103.name: The Long Tunnel
4103.description:
This is a long east-west tunnel. It is not all that wide at this point,
perhaps wide enough for two people to stand side by side without
impeding each other. Off to the west it appears that the tunnel opens up
some more while to the east it dives further down into the earth, and
Visible is a small hole about two feet in diameter about waist height in
the southern wall. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.
Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Long Tunnel

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

west.description: A trail winds toward The Long Tunnel

4104.name: The Long Tunnel
4104.description:
The passage opens in a small bulbous cavern ending. The somewhat
circular 'room' is about thirty feet in diameter and Visible is one exit
from it; a tunnel leading sharply upwards from the western wall. The
walls of this cavern are quite indistinct and you cannot see any moss or
dampness on them whatsoever. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.
Ancient trees rise on all sides.

west.description: A trail winds toward The Long Tunnel

4105.name: The Golden Cave
4105.description:
This is what appears to be the north-east corner of this large cavern.
The cave is lit by the eerie, soft, golden light which looks to be
emanating from the walls themselves. The cave itself is enormous,
extending quite a distance to the west and south. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

4106.name: The Golden Cave
4106.description:
This is what appears to be the north-west corner of this large cavern.
The cave is lit by the eerie, soft, golden light which looks to be
emanating from the walls themselves. The cave itself is enormous,
extending quite a distance to the east and south. There is a hole in the
northern wall, about two feet in diameter. All that can be seen through
the hole is darkness. The sounds of city life echo around you. Buildings
crowd together on all sides.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Long Tunnel

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

4107.name: The Passage
4107.description:
The area opens at the elbow turn of a small passageway. It turns quite
sharply to the south and west. To the south, it appears that the passage
continues, but to the west Visible is what almost appears to be a golden
light. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

south.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

4108.name: The Golden Cave
4108.description:
This is what appears to be the south-east corner of this large cavern.
The cave is lit by the eerie, soft, golden light which looks to be
emanating from the walls themselves. The cave itself is enormous,
extending quite a distance to the west and north. A crack in the wall to
the east appears to lead into a passageway of sorts. Buildings crowd
together on all sides. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

east.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

4109.name: The Golden Cave
4109.description:
This is what appears to be the middle of the western wall of this large
cavern. The cave is lit by the eerie, soft, golden light which looks to
be emanating from the walls themselves. The cave itself is enormous,
extending quite a distance to the east, south, and north. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

4110.name: The Hole
4110.description:
The passage opens standing in a small alcove as the tunnel comes to a
somewhat sudden end. Looking about you suddenly notice a rather big hole
in the floor of the tunnel. In fact, it seems that another step forward
and you would have fallen into it. The tunnel itself leads to the west,
and looking down into the hole in the floor reveals little beyond the
fact that it seems to be very deep and very dark. There is a very
strange smell emanating from the hole, it almost smells like something
down there is rotting. The scent of pine and earth fills the air.
Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4111.name: The Tunnel
4111.description:
The walls of this small tunnel are almost completely covered in a
strange orange moss that flakes off to the touch. The tunnel leads in an
east-west direction and the air within is very damp and very stagnant.
There is no detectable breeze at all but a strange smell emanates from
the east. There is a small, almost unnoticed hole in the southern wall.
Bird calls echo through the canopy. Ancient trees rise on all sides.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Hole

south.description: The hole looks very small.  You will probably have to crawl through it.

west.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

4112.name: The Tunnel
4112.description:
The tunnel in which you currently stand is fairly wide (very wide
relative to almost all the other tunnels around here it seems) and yet
the air is quite damp. The walls have a thin coating of moisture upon
them which looks and feels somewhat oiley. The tunnel leads in an east-
west direction. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. Ancient trees
rise on all sides.

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

west.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

4113.name: The Passage
4113.description:
This north-south passageway looks to be a natural creation, except that
the walls looks to have been roughly hewn in order to smooth them a
somewhat to make passage easier. The walls still meander as the passage
makes its way deeper into the bowels of the earth. A bizarre shadow in
the eastern wall leads you to suspect that a small passage meets the
tunnel there. Ancient trees rise on all sides. The scent of pine and
earth fills the air.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

east.description: A trail winds toward The Tunnel

south.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

4114.name: The Golden Cave
4114.description:
This is what appears to be the south-west corner of this large cavern.
The cave is lit by the eerie, soft, golden light which looks to be
emanating from the walls themselves. The cave itself is enormous,
extending quite a distance to the north and a strange shadow formation
seems to indicate a passage entrance to the west. Buildings crowd
together on all sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

west.description: A trail winds toward The Dark Passage

4115.name: The Dark Passage
4115.description:
The passage opens in a small passage ending. It is quite dark in here.
As you look about the damp walls, you notice that the passageway almost
appears to curve upwards towards the ceiling. Looking up, you notice
that there is a small hole, just large enough to pass through. Looking
closely at the curved part of the wall, it appears that someone (or
something) has carved small handholds into the wall to ease passage
upwards. The tunnel itself leads off to the east. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the canopy.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

up.description: A trail winds toward The Hole

4116.name: The Passage
4116.description:
The passage opens in quite an ordinary passageway which leads north and
south. It looks to be wide enough for two people to walk side by side
with plenty of room. The passage appears to be almost rectangular in
form. Far off to the south Visible is the pinpoint of a light. The
forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. The scent of pine and earth
fills the air.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

south.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

4117.name: The Secret Tunnel
4117.description:
The area is currently standing in a narrow passageway that does not seem
to have been heavily visited at any time. It leads northwards towards a
lit room and south towards what appears to be a chamber. The forest
floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo through the
canopy.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Golden Cave

south.description: A trail winds toward The Secret Chamber

4118.name: The Cave
4118.description:
This rather large cave is surprisingly very well lit. There are about
twenty torches spread about the room set in sconces which hang several
feet above your head. The dancing shadows created by the flickering
flames catch your eyes for a few minutes and threaten to hold you
entranced. Looking about the cave, it appears to continue to the west
and south. In the north wall a strange vertical crack looks as if it may
lead somewhere. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The cobblestones
are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: It looks like quite the tight fit.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

4119.name: The Cave
4119.description:
This rather large cave is surprisingly very well lit. There are about
twenty torches spread about the room set in sconces which hang several
feet above your head. The dancing shadows created by the flickering
flames catch your eyes for a few minutes and threaten to hold you
entranced. Looking about the cave, it appears to continue to the east
and south. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

west.description: The rock wall to the west looks odd for some strange reason.

4120.name: The Passage
4120.description:
The area opens in a fairly normal passage, slightly wider than is
necessary for one person, but not quite wide enough for two. The ceiling
dips here rather surprisingly, or wait, is that because the floor climbs
upwards toward it? The tunnel seems to narrow slightly more as you look
to the south, and widens up somewhat as you look northward. The light to
the south continues to flicker. Stone chimes hang from a fissure below.
Bird calls echo through the canopy. Branches intertwine overhead,
filtering the light.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

south.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

down.description: A fissure drops into a chamber below.
down.reveal_message: You find a fissure leading down into the depths.

4121.name: The Secret Tunnel
4121.description:
The area opens in a very unnatural hallway, about ten feet across and
about ten or twelve feet up. The passageway funnels down towards the
west where it leads to a doorway that looks to be about five feet
across. The east end of the tunnel comes to a sudden end at a very
smooth rock wall. Bird calls echo through the canopy. Ancient trees rise
on all sides.

east.description: The rock wall to the east looks like it might be able to be moved.

west.description: A trail winds toward The Secret Chamber

4122.name: The Secret Chamber
4122.description:
The area opens in a small chamber that you never would have thought
could exist. This small, almost perfectly round cave does not appear to
be a natural formation at all, since the walls are far too smooth and
the doorways to the north and east are both almost exactly five feet
wide and eleven feet tall. Bird calls echo through the canopy. The scent
of pine and earth fills the air.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Secret Tunnel

east.description: A trail winds toward The Secret Tunnel

4123.name: The Cave
4123.description:
This rather large cave is surprisingly very well lit. There are about
twenty torches spread about the room set in sconces which hang several
feet above your head. The dancing shadows created by the flickering
flames catch your eyes for a few minutes and threaten to hold you
entranced. Looking about the cave, it appears to continue to the west
and north. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

4124.name: The Cave
4124.description:
This rather large cave is surprisingly very well lit. There are about
twenty torches spread about the room set in sconces which hang several
feet above your head. The dancing shadows created by the flickering
flames catch your eyes for a few minutes and threaten to hold you
entranced. Looking about the cave, it appears to continue to the east
and north. There is a passageway leading out of the western wall of the
cave which looks to turn northwards. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

west.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

4125.name: The Passage
4125.description:
This is the end of a narrow passage which leads away from here to the
north. The southern wall is bare and almost seems to dance with the
shadows created by the flickering light emanating from the cave to the
east. The forest floor is carpeted with fallen leaves. Bird calls echo
through the canopy.

north.description: A trail winds toward The Passage

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Cave

4126.name: The Crawlway
4126.description:
This is a very narrow crawlway. To back out of it, you would have to
move carefully in order to not catch anything on the jutting rocks of
the ceiling and walls. The diameter of the crawlway is about two feet,
and is a rather tight squeeze. You'd better hope that there aren't any
worms or similar creatures down this way since it might be difficult to
defend yourself in here. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The wind
howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: You can see a small hole marking the north exit of the crawlway.

south.description: You can see the light emanating from the southern exit of the crawlway.

4127.name: A Collapsed Side Shaft
4127.description:
This narrow shaft is littered with broken timbers and mining tools.
Fresh scuffs mark a path through the rubble. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: The shaft returns to the tunnel.

4128.name: The Dwarven Reliquary
4128.description:
A hidden reliquary glows with old warding runes. Stone shelves hold
relics and records. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

west.description: The crack opens back to the large cave.

4129.name: A Vein of Mithril
4129.description:
The walls here sparkle with a thin vein of mithril. A strongbox sits
where a foreman once stood. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

east.description: The braced door leads back east.

4130.name: The Listening Chamber
4130.description:
This chamber hums with the faint sound of the mountain above. Hanging
stones chime when you breathe. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
Shadows gather in the corners.

4000.name: snake
4000.long_desc: A large dreadful snake is at your feet, hissing at you.

4001.name: snake
4001.long_desc: A small green snake is here, and it doesn't look too friendly...

4002.name: centipede
4002.long_desc: A small centipede is here, making its way across the floor.

4003.name: kobold
4003.long_desc: An ugly kobold is here, searching for dinner.

4004.name: orc
4004.long_desc: The orc walks around, looking for someone to kill.
4004.description: You notice an evil look in its eyes...

4005.name: orc
4005.long_desc: A large orc is here, looking really mean.

4050.name: warrior
4050.long_desc: A tall warrior is here.  He has more scars than anyone you have ever seen.
4050.description: He seems to be a strong, brainless fighter.

4051.name: warrior
4051.description: He seems to know his way with weapons.

4054.name: centipede
4054.description: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.

4056.name: orc
4056.long_desc: An orc is here, looking for something (or perhaps someone?) to eat.
4056.description: Well, he doesn't seem to be friendly.

4057.name: lion
4057.long_desc: A mountain lion is here, growling at you viciously.
4057.description: The lion looks very nasty with huge claws and big teeth.

4058.name: giant
4058.long_desc: A hill giant is here, tossing some rocks around.
4058.description:
The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall.  By his actions you 
quickly come to the conclusion that he isn't very intelligent.

4100.name: mage
4100.long_desc: A small intelligent looking mage is standing here.
4100.description:
His IQ makes almost any normal person look stupid...
It looks like he knows his way with magic.

4101.name: troll
4101.long_desc: A large mean-looking troll is here.

4102.name: snake
4102.long_desc: A large green snake is here, looks like a guardian for an evil force.

4103.name: thief
4103.long_desc: A thief is here, all dressed in black.
4103.description:
He seems to be counting a handful of coins.  Maybe you ought to count YOUR
gold too...

4104.name: orc
4104.long_desc: A ugly orc is standing here.
4104.description: It is quite disgusting to look at.

4105.name: centipede
4105.long_desc: A small harmless centipede is here.
4105.description: Well it doesn't seem to pay any attention to you.

4106.name: warrior
4106.long_desc: A human warrior is here.  He has a evil grin in his face.
4106.description: He doesn't look friendly at all...

4098.name: dwarven miner
4098.long_desc: A grizzled dwarven miner sits here, resting against a collapsed tunnel wall.
4098.description: His beard is caked with dust and his hands are raw from pickaxe work. His eyes dart nervously toward the deeper tunnels whenever a sound echoes from below.

talk_responses.hello: The miner wipes sweat from his brow. 'Don't go deeper than you have to, friend. I've been hearing sounds from below — not cave-ins, something worse. Rhythmic, like drums... or footsteps. Big ones.'
talk_responses.danger: The miner shudders. 'The snakes down here are bad enough, but there are darker things in the deep tunnels. Stick to the lit passages if you value your skin.'
talk_responses.default: The miner grunts. 'Watch your step. These tunnels have a way of swallowing folk whole.'
talk_responses.next: The miner spits on the ground. 'You handle yourself well down here. The city of Thalos to the east could use capable fighters. Or if you're brave enough, the Drow lurk in their underground city far below. The sewers beneath Midgaard also hide nastier things than rats, if you catch my drift.'

4099.name: lost adventurer
4099.long_desc: A wounded adventurer leans against the wall here, nursing a bandaged arm.
4099.description: She's young, barely out of her teens, with a dented shield and a sword notched beyond repair. Her eyes have the hollow look of someone who's seen too much down here.

talk_responses.hello: The adventurer winces. 'Turn back if you can. The snakes in the tunnels have venom that'll drop you before you can scream. And further down... I saw shapes moving in the dark. Dozens of them.'
talk_responses.snakes: She grips her bandaged arm. 'Poison. Got me through a gap in my armor. Carry antidotes if you have them — the green ones are the worst.'
talk_responses.default: The adventurer stares blankly. 'I just want to find the way out...'

4000.name: ring
4000.room_desc: A ring is here, with yellow and green ornamentation.  It looks very old.

4001.name: miner's pickaxe
4001.description: A sturdy pickaxe used in the mines.

4002.name: miner's iron helmet
4002.room_desc: A miner's iron helmet lies here.

4053.name: dirk
4053.room_desc: A beautifully crafted dirk is lying here.

4100.name: blade
4100.room_desc: A black demon blade is here.

4101.name: gloves
4101.room_desc: A pair of finely crafted gloves are lying on the ground here.

4102.name: scroll
4102.room_desc: A scroll which reads 'ysafg', it looks very fragile and quite old.

4103.name: slime
4103.room_desc: A green slime mould is here.  Stinks like you wouldn't believe!

4104.name: slime
4104.room_desc: A green slime mould is here.  Stinks like you wouldn't believe!

4120.name: a moria delver's notes
4120.room_desc: A bundle of notes is tucked into a stone niche.
4120.description: Careful handwriting maps the lower tunnels.
4120.lore_text: "The mithril vein sings when the mountain shifts. We marked it with chimes."

4121.name: a foreman's ledger
4121.room_desc: A worn ledger rests beside the strongbox.
4121.description: The pages are thick with soot and numbers.
4121.lore_text: "Three crews missing. The deep shaft is sealed until the chimes are silent."

4122.name: a mithril shard
4122.room_desc: A gleaming mithril shard lies among the rubble.
4122.description: Light dances across its silvery surface.

4123.name: an ironbound strongbox
4123.description: Its lock is engraved with a pickaxe symbol.

4124.name: a foreman's key
4124.room_desc: A heavy key hangs from a hook.
4124.description: The key is stamped with a dwarven sigil.

4125.name: an echo stone
4125.room_desc: A smooth stone hums softly here.
4125.description: When held, it vibrates with distant echoes.

4095.name: stone signpost
4095.room_desc: A sturdy dwarven stone marker is set into the cave wall.
4095.readable_text:
=== MINES OF MORIA (Upper Levels) ===
Recommended Level: 8-15
WARNING: Goblins and cave creatures infest these tunnels
Seek Grimjaw the Prospector for work
Deeper levels (Level 15+) lie below

4003.name: miner's heavy boots
4003.short_desc: a pair of miner's heavy boots
4003.room_desc: A pair of heavy mining boots lies here.

4004.name: miner's thick gloves
4004.short_desc: a pair of miner's thick gloves
